languages.text: {n}Исследовав архивы еще немного, вы находите уцелевший кусок отчета капитана стражи, из которого удается понять, что системы защиты недавно переключали без его согласования. Комментарий капитана гласит:{/n} "Доступ к системам жизнеобеспечения имеют лишь хранители станции... Но господин Теобальд все время находился подле Дитя, как и я. Неужели..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Исследовав архивы еще немного, вы находите уцелевший кусок отчета капитана стражи, из которого удается понять, что системы защиты недавно переключали без его согласования. Комментарий капитана гласит:{/n} "Доступ к системам жизнеобеспечения имеют лишь хранители станции... Но господин Теобальд все время находился подле Дитя, как и я. Неужели..."

languages.text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."
languages.original_text: {n}Исследовав архивы еще немного, вы находите уцелевший кусок отчета капитана стражи, из которого удается понять, что системы защиты недавно переключали без его согласования. Комментарий капитана гласит:{/n} "Доступ к системам жизнеобеспечения имеют лишь хранители станции... Но господин Теобальд все время находился подле Дитя, как и я. Неужели..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer allows you to recover a surviving excerpt from a report by the captain of the guard that mentions the security system had recently been reconfigured without letting him know. His comment goes as follows:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support system... But master Theobald had been at the Child's side, and so was I. Could it be that..."

His comment goes as follows:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support system... But master Theobald had been at the Child's side, and so was I. Could it be that..."

His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But master Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

{n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

languages.text: {n}Eine gründliche Durchsuchung der Archive fördert einen Auszug aus dem Bericht des Wachhauptmanns zu Tage. Darin wird erwähnt, dass das Sicherheitssystem vor kurzem ohne sein Wissen neu konfiguriert worden war. Sein Kommentar lautet:{/n} "Nur die Hüter der Station haben Zugriff auf die Lebenserhaltungssysteme ... Doch Hüter Theobald ist nicht von der Seite des Kindes gewichen, und ich ebenso wenig. Kann es möglicherweise sein, dass ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine gründliche Durchsuchung der Archive fördert einen Auszug aus dem Bericht des Wachhauptmanns zu Tage. Darin wird erwähnt, dass das Sicherheitssystem vor kurzem ohne sein Wissen neu konfiguriert worden war. Sein Kommentar lautet:{/n} "Nur die Hüter der Station haben Zugriff auf die Lebenserhaltungssysteme ... Doch Meister Theobald ist nicht von der Seite des Kindes gewichen, und ich ebenso wenig. Kann es möglicherweise sein, dass ..."

languages.text: {n}En explorant les archives un peu plus longtemps, vous parvenez à récupérer un extrait du rapport du capitaine de la sécurité mentionnant que le système de sécurité a été reconfiguré récemment à son insu. Son commentaire indique :{/n} « Seuls les gardiens de la station ont accès aux systèmes de survie... Mais le gardien Théobald n'a pas quitté l'Enfant, pas plus que moi. Se pourrait-il que... »
languages.original_text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

traits.locale_text: {n}En explorant les archives un peu plus longtemps, vous parvenez à récupérer un extrait du rapport du capitaine de la sécurité mentionnant que le système de sécurité a été reconfiguré récemment à son insu. Son commentaire indique :{/n} « Seuls les gardiens de la station ont accès aux systèmes de survie... Mais maître Théobald n'a pas quitté l'Enfant, pas plus que moi. Se pourrait-il que... »

languages.text: {n}你又在档案库中搜索了一段时间，发现了警卫队长报告中的残存片段。其中提到，安保系统在他不知情的情况下被某个人重新设置过。对这件事情，他是这么评论的。{/n}“只有星站的守护者才有权访问生命维持系统……可西奥巴德大人一刻都未曾离开过圣子身边，我也没离开过。莫非是……”
languages.original_text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

traits.locale_text: {n}你又在档案库中搜索了一段时间，发现了警卫队长报告中的残存片段。其中提到，安保系统在他不知情的情况下被某个人重新设置过。对这件事情，他是这么评论的。{/n}“只有星站的守护者才有权访问生命维持系统……可西奥巴德大师一刻都未曾离开过圣子身边，我也没离开过。莫非是……”

languages.text: {n}しばらくアーカイブを調べていると、部隊長の報告書の抜粋が残されており、最近、セキュリティシステムが知らぬ間に再構築されていたとの記載があった。部隊長のコメントはこう書いてある。{/n}「ステーションの保持者だけが生命維持システムにアクセスできる…しかし、保持者のシオボールドも私もずっと御子の側にいた。ということは…」
languages.original_text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

traits.locale_text: {n}もう少しアーカイブを調べていると、部隊長の報告書の抜粋が残っていて、最近、セキュリティシステムが知らぬ間に再構築されていたとの記載があった。部隊長のコメントはこう書いてある。{/n}「ステーションの管理人だけが生命維持システムにアクセスできる…しかし、テオバルド様はずっと御子の側にいて、私もそうだった。ということは…」
{n}しばらくアーカイブを調べていると、部隊長の報告書の抜粋が残されており、最近、セキュリティシステムが知らぬ間に再構築されていたとの記載があった。部隊長のコメントはこう書いてある。{/n}「ステーションの保持者だけが生命維持システムにアクセスできる…しかし、保持者のシオボールドも私もずっと御子の側にいた。ということは…」

languages.text: {n}Al explorar un poco más los archivos encuentras un extracto superviviente del informe del capitán de la guardia, mencionando que el sistema de seguridad había sido reconfigurado sin que lo supiera. Esto es lo que dice:{/n} «Solo los guardianes de la estación tienen acceso a los sistemas de soporte vital... Pero el guardián Theobald no se había alejado de la Niña en todo este tiempo, ni yo tampoco. ¿Podría ser...?».
languages.original_text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al explorar un poco más los archivos encuentras un extracto superviviente del informe del capitán de la guardia, mencionando que el sistema de seguridad había sido reconfigurado sin que lo supiera. Esto es lo que dice:{/n} «Solo los guardianes de la estación tienen acceso a los sistemas de soporte vital... Pero el maestro Theobald no se había alejado de la Niña en todo este tiempo, ni yo tampoco. ¿Podría ser...?».

languages.text: {n}Arşivleri bir vakit daha inceleyince muhafız başının raporundan kalan bir parçaya ulaşıyorsun. Güvenlik sisteminin yakın zamanda bilgisi olmadan yeniden yapılandırıldığından bahsediyor. Yorumu şöyle:{/n} "Yalnızca İstasyon Sorumluları, yaşam destek sistemlerine erişebilir. Lakin Sorumlu Theobald da ben de Çocuk'un yanından ayrılmamıştık. Acaba..."
languages.original_text: {n}Exploring the archives for a while longer yields a surviving excerpt from the guard captain's report mentioning that the security system had recently been reconfigured without his knowledge. His comment reads:{/n} "Only the Keepers of the Station have access to the life support systems... But Keeper Theobald had not left the Child's side, and neither had I. Could it be that..."
